body:
Music has been a way to express oneself through an instrumental or vocal way. I'd like to know your favorite songs from any era, any language or any genre. Please elaborate and tell me why it is your favorite song and please post a link to the music video on Youtube.

Thanks guys and I'm waiting for your responses.

title: Favorite song?

replies.body:
I might as well post the song i'm listening to right now. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RrsOOP9DpkY
I like night core in general as i'm not the biggest fan of vocals in songs and i like to focus purely on the bass/tempo of a song.
